actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide that whenever the exportation of any agricultural commodity is prohibited or curtailed as a result of action taken by the President or any Federal agency, the exportation of any primary element in the production of such agricultural commodity shall be prohibited or curtailed in the same manner and to the same extent.

summary.text: Provides that whenever the exportation of any agricultural commodity is prohibited or curtailed by the President or a Federal agency, the exportation of any prime element in the production of such commodity shall also be curtailed or prohibited in the same manner and to the same extent.

titles.title: A bill to provide that whenever the exportation of any agricultural commodity is prohibited or curtailed as a result of action taken by the President or any Federal agency, the exportation of any primary element in the production of such agricultural commodity shall be prohibited or curtailed in the same manner and to the same extent.
